title: General Consultation
description: Comprehensive health assessment and diagnosis for acute and chronic conditions. Treatment planning and preventive health guidance.

title: Chronic Disease Management
description: Expert management of diabetes, hypertension, thyroid disorders. Regular monitoring and medication management with lifestyle counseling.

title: Preventive Health Checkup
description: Annual physical examinations, age-appropriate screening tests, and comprehensive health risk assessments.

title: Women's Health
description: Comprehensive reproductive health consultations, prenatal and postnatal care, and menopause management.

title: Pediatric Care
description: Child health monitoring, vaccination schedules, and growth and development tracking for children of all ages.

title: Minor Procedures
description: Wound care and suturing, abscess drainage, ECG and basic diagnostic tests performed in-clinic.
